phrases: With his face shimmering brightly in the pitch black darkness...
Even now, I clearly remember how he was that night, when he was only seventeen years old.
Usotsuki na anata nakimushi no atashi
Doushite umaku ikanai wa
Oshare shita kami mo rain suton no tsume mo
Anata wa kidzuki mo shinai ne
Love kanashii namida nanka ja nai yo
Me ga kawaite hirihiri suru dake
Kono unmei bakari I love
Kimi dake wo atashi dake wo
Atsui omoi wo uketomete
Doko made mo tsunagattetai
Kawaikunai nakigao mo se mo aishiteru
Why cannot things go well between
the liar, you, and the crybaby, me?
You do not notice my styled hair
or my nice set of press-on nails.
Love is not about the unhappy tears that go along with it.
Those tears only leave my eyes dry and hurt me.
I love this destiny
between only you and only me.
I want to accept your hot feelings
and be taken by you forever.
Despite your uncute, tearful face and your shortness, I still love you.
Episode 20 ...
Huh?
The girl from the hook-up party the other day?
Yeah.
As it turns out, I am seeing her again this weekend.
But meeting her by myself is a little embarrassing.
You, embarrassed?
That is a rare sight.
Not me!
Her.
She asked if she could come with a friend.
So, would you come, too?
What?
Go see her by yourself!
Such a pain.
Please!
Pretty please?
You only have to stay for half the time!
So will not you come, friend of mine?
Get someone else.
You are the only guy I know who is always doing nothing!
See you at 1 PM tomorrow at the plaza in front of the station!
Yano?
What jacket are you going to wear on Sunday?
Huh?
Why do you ask?
If you are not going to wear one, I was thinking of wearing my stadium jumper.
You know, my red one.
Oh, that one?
The one that looks a lot like mine, right?
Why would not you?
If we both wore the same one, we would have that whole couple look going, and that would be kind of scary.
What is wrong with the couple look?
No, do not say that!
Do not you dare wear yours, okay?
Oh, what should I do?
Geez.
Sorry to keep you waiting!
Hey!
This is my friend.
He was with us the other day, remember?
Oh, right!
Hi there.
Hey.
So, let us get going!
Why do not we go get a cup of tea?
You really know what hits the spot!
Where should we go?
It is nice having you as a fellow tag-along today.
Ah, yeah!
Same with you.
You see, I cannot really handle really spicy food.
That is fine!
Why do not we have something you like?
Here you go!
Open wide!
Did he really need me to come along...?
The other day...
At the hook-up party, you sat on the far right the whole time, did not you?
I was on the left, so we never got a chance to speak, right?
Ah... yeah... was it like that?
Yeah!
Are you sure you just do not like hook-up parties?
No...
Then, do you remember my name?
Sorry... I am really sorry.
I am bad at remembering names.
It is alright.
I never really stand out at those things anyway.
That is not true!
You are cute, Chisa!
Yeah!
Chisa-chan, you were the most popular girl there!
No joke!
Though you are my number one, my cute little Mai!
Oh, you are so honest!
Open wide!
He is good...
Is it good?
It is!
I am glad!
Even though you were the most popular, you are just a tag-along today?
Well...
I really think you have to like the person back, or it will not work.
Ah, really?!
You could not be more right!
I feel the same way.
Takeuchi-kun... do not you have someone you like?
Ah... yeah.
But... it ended up not working out.
That is why I got all desperate and ended up going to that hook-up party.
It must be hard getting over that sort of stuff, huh?
Yeah...
It sure was good!
It was a good meal!
Where should we go next?
Wherever you want Mai-chan.
A perfect escape!
Those two should be fine by themselves.
It is hard to believe she thought it would be embarrassing by herself.
Let us leave them alone.
Later.
Good work today.
The bus I take is this way.
So, umm... have a safe trip home, Miyata-san.
Umm...!
It was all a lie!
I had those two set this whole thing up for me.
I just really wanted to see you again!
Since I did not have a chance to talk to you the other day.
And when I actually had the chance today, you turned out to be the type of person I thought you were...
A really, really nice person.
I am sorry for lying and fooling you like this.
I know you do not like these sorts of things.
But would you please consider hanging out with me some more?
Would you please give me a chance and go out with me for just one month?
You are so heavy...
Lala... do not jump on me...
Lalami.
Lala.
Nana... Nanami.
You are heavy.
Do not get on top of me like that.
Just kidding.
Sign: A refreshing Sunday morning.
What the heck is this, first thing in the morning?
We will be borrowing your room today.
It is time to celebrate...
Apparently, the girl asked him to give her a chance, and to go out with her for a month!
Ah, you just cannot turn down those sorts of things!
Oh, here he comes!
Hurry and prepare the party poppers!
Hurry!
Hurry!
But do not you think the whole time limit thing is awesome?
After all, you never really know until you go out.
Congrats!
Dumbass.
Nana-chan, I am sorry!
Nana-chan...
It totally skipped my mind.
I did not do it on purpose.
I swear.
Red jacket
Red jacket
Red jacket
Red jacket
After I went on and on about it the day before last.
I am sorry.
You do not listen to anything I say.
I am sorry.
Before I left, things were a little crazy...
What else could you have possibly been thinking about when you put it on?
What are you doing?!
I will take you somewhere nice.
So, forgive me?
I will not be tricked so easily.
We shall see, will not we?
Anyway, put on your jacket.
Sign: Pet Land
They are so adorable!
I could just eat them all up!
My Lalami is the best, though!
Ah, it is a corgi.
Parakeets
There are squirrels over here.
Wait a sec!
I am going to make this my background.
It was so much fun, was not it?
You look refreshed.
I could definitely own a corgi.
The kittens were so cute!
But my Lalami's the best.
Hey... do you think you can fall in love with someone you do not like to begin with?
What is this, so out of the blue?
For example, even if you do not like someone, you still go out with them and force yourself to fall for them.
I like someone now I used to hate.
Really?
Who?
You.
What?
You hated me?
When we were freshmen, yeah.
Why are you so shocked?
Did not he realize...?
D-Do not they say love and hate are two sides of the same coin?
You get mad because they are stuck in your head, right?
Did not you say something like that before?
But some things never go right with these things, do not you think?
What does not?
Your feelings.
How so?
For example...
A couple in red!
That is really popular, huh?
Yano, let us not holds hands!
It is fine!
Just forget that ugly woman!
You moron!
Doofus!
For example, when your boyfriend's being a complete moron and you want to kick him...
You always give in to your feelings.
Love is the opposite of great effort, do not you think?
Tell that to him, would you?
Never mind.
I love you, Nana-chan.
Will love come to Ms. Mizuguchi Kana?
How will the last episode turn out?
Will she fall in wonderful love, or will someone fall in wonderful love with her?
Come to me, love!
Come love, come!
Mizuguchi Kana will now sing Come On, My Love!
Come on my love!
Like I have been saying, it has to be love when girls take off their glasses.
It is so obvious now!
But who would go out with her?
I will pass.
You do not even have a girlfriend!
You are evil to suggest someone like that!
Well, you are single!
They do not suit you.
I am just not used to them yet.
Dirt gets in them so easily.
Your eyes are bright red, like a rabbit's.
You look better in glasses.
Ms. Rabbit.
I am going to go get another ball.
Hey, Moto.
Why are you getting so mad?
I am not.
There are things you just cannot know until you try going out.
Just try going out with her for a month.
Well, it looks like I really could not fall for you.
Sorry!
It would have been much better to decline at the beginning.
Hey!
Saying you will try going out for a month is the same as saying you will keep going out after a month!
I know!
I have been prepared for that much since the beginning.
Do not underestimate me, moron.
Oh?
So you will go out with her even though you do not like her?
You sure like to volunteer for anything, huh?
I am going out with her to fall for her!
You will not.
You sound so sure of yourself, huh?
After all, you have never fallen for someone who is fallen for you first.
It might happen!
I do not think so.
I would go so far as to swear it will not.
Then what do you suggest?
Do not go out with some girl you do not even like.
You are just wasting time!
I do not want to hear that coming from you.
You just think about making your own girl not cry!
What the hell did you say?!
What?
Hey!
You little...!
Wh... What is the matter?
J-Just some advice on how to style his hair.
For the hottest and coolest look this fall.
Do not you think it would look cool to lengthen your sideburns some more?
Just take some from the left.
Ah, I was just thinking the same thing!
It is all about the lack of balance, right?
But... is not that Yano's hair in your hand?
You are already losing this much hair!
Here, I will give it back.
Th-This could be bad!
Blood...
Takeuchi-kun, you are bleeding.
They say if you lick it, it will heal!
Lick, lick, lick!
Oh, thank you!
Are you sure you two were not fighting?
Us?
Of course not!
Moto, I went too far.
Sorry.
It is fine.
After all, I am usually the one going too far.
I do understand what you are saying.
You are right.
But I... need to move forward.
Try to understand.
What kind of girl is she?
Like Kanno Miho...
Kanno?
Note: A famous Japanese actress and J-Pop singer.
Take her, and make her a little more plain.
No idea what you are talking about...
She is really pale.
But...
I think she is a good girl.
Takahashi!
Over here!
I brought your notebook.
You could have just brought it to school tomorrow...
There was no reason to come out this late.
That is all right.
And here are some steamed meat buns.
Steamed meat buns?
So I heard Takeuchi-kun got a girlfriend?
Why cannot you be happy for him?
That is no good, Yano.
Because it is not like him.
Umm...
I think love that you have to work at is also all right.
What is up with that?
You are weird.
I am not too sure myself.
You are too split on the issue.
I wanted Take to go out with a girl he actually liked.
After all, he is a really good guy.
Yeah.
That is why everything will be all right!
Since the girl he is going out with is a girl who can understand that goodness in him.
It will definitely turn out okay!
W-What?
Your hair's wet.
Ah, maybe.
I took a bath earlier tonight.
You will catch a cold like that!
Do not tell me those are your PJ's?
Take my sweater.
It is all right!
You will catch a cold!
I have got a lot on underneath, so I am fine.
Then should I warm you up some more?
It will be too embarrassing if someone walks by!
Stop!
She is... not wearing a bra!
Oh, yeah.
I have got a bandana in my pocket.
There you go.
This way, your head should be protected from the cold.
Little Red Riding Hood!
I would like to go on a trip with you, Takahashi.
Ah, I know we cannot go, not yet.
We are in no hurry.
And it does not have to be a full-blown trip...
I would just like to go somewhere... someplace where we can be alone together.
Someplace where no one can disturb us.
Someplace where we do not have to think about having to go home later...
I want to hurry and become an adult...
I want to hurry and become an adult... so I can come and steal you away.
If only... there was such a thing as eternity.
There is.
It does exist.
I am sure of it.
With his face shimmering brightly in the pitch black darkness...
Even now, I clearly remember how he was that night, when he was only seventeen years old.
Even though we are now both adults, we know there is no such thing as eternity.
Now that we are no longer kids...
But back then... time truly stopped, and we were the only people in the world.
That moment was so real... and yet so dreamlike...
It felt like it only lasted a moment... yet also an eternity.
Within our youthful hearts at the time, I am sure eternity really existed.
Hello?
Ah, yeah.
I saw your message.
Yeah, it is no problem.
It is really no problem at all!
Yeah.
Then, see you tomorrow in front of the station.
However...
Everyone...
I Am About To kimi ga iikaketa kotoba ga
Yubisaki ni sotto oritekita
Nanimo iwanakute ii yo
Tsumaida yubi wo gyutto atatamete
Kotoba wa kotoba dakara kokoro hanbun mo tsutaenai kara
Setsunakute modokashikute yuuyake futari wo tsutsundeiru
Komiageru mune no omoi kokoro ga itai yo
Moshi kimi ga tabibito ni nattara
Kore gurai kimi wo matteru darou
Kisetsu wa kawaru sono tabi ni
Kioku ga usuragu koto ga attemo
dareka wo konna fuu ni kokoro ippai de aisenai kara
Mamaritai taisetsu na kimi
Itsu datte futari wa hitori ja nai
Kono mune ga kawaresou de
Furete hoshii yo
Setsunakute modokashikute kaerenai kono mama aruiteitai
Yabaisaki ni kanjiteiru kokoro no kotoba wo
The words you were just about to say
fell softly onto my fingertips.
You do not have to say anything.
I will clasp your hand tightly and warm it up.
Because words are words, I cannot express half of the feelings in my heart.
It is so wrenching and irritating as the sunset engulfs the two of us.
My heart aches from all the feelings welling up inside of me.
If you were to become a traveler,
would I be able to wait for you as I do now?
As the seasons change,
even if our memories are to fade.
I would not be able to love someone with all of my heart like this.
I want to protect the precious you.
The two of us are never alone.
Me heart feels so fragile
and I want you to touch it.
It is so wrenching and irritating that I cannot go home.
I want to keep walking like this.
I feel the words from your heart on my fingertips.
Episode 21 Preview...
Why do not you sleep over on Sunday night?
I thought we would be able to be together all day, so...
Yamamoto's mom collapsed...
Why today, of all days...
What the hell are you doing?!
I love you...
I have loved you this whole time...
